page.title: 18TRANSPORT IN 1985.
page.content: In our school{96.8%}families have{cars {3.2%}don't. One of the families has a {motorbike and side}car which they use. {Mr. Mansell}(who hasn't a car) works on the farm & the farmer takes him to work. In{Broad Town}there are{5 bus {services.}There is a{workers bus}(run by{Parkers)}which goes into{Swindon. It runs at{7am. & 5.15pm.}On{Tuesday a bus run by{Rimes}goes to{Carrefour. Also there is a school bus which takes children to our school, and the {comprehensive,}run by{Athelstan coaches. On{Wednesday}and{Friday {Thamesdown}run a service which goes through{Broad Town, Clyffe Pypard, {Cotmarsh, Wootton Bassett}and ends at {Swindon}bus station. Another service run by{Thamesdown Transport}goes to {Swindon to Devizes.}The bus goes on the{A361}road and doesn't turn off into the village of{Broad Hinton.
